_sText:
Surf_Greatriver_Reventon

_____________________________________________________ Surf_Greatriver_Reventon by .ParadoxX _____________________________________________________

In the second version, everythink will be better

_____________________________________________________ Special Thanks: BraveSurf Lightning Bravesurf Chefkochmaps oneBit Ruinskill _____________________________________________________ Weapons: Deagle Knife Hegrenade Flashbang AWP M249 Scout M3 Mac10 MP5 Galil M4A1 AK47 _____________________________________________________ This is a combat surf map based on Greatriver. The concept is the same but some featurs are different and the design is new. There is 1 secret in the map. The admin room. I think it is quite funny to play admin. Do not decompile it. Just try by urself to get in it. In the admin room is a buyzone and a weapon storage. This is the first version of surf_gr_reventon. I think i will make a second version with more rails and more secrets etc. u can surf the map like xdre4m. I try to apply the most teleporters of greatriver that u can surf it quite good because of the popularity. So have fun with it .ParadoxX _____________________________________________________
